about_the_game:
Legacy of Allard is a 2D, Turn-based Strategy, Artillery-based, Single and Multiplayer RPG. You can play by yourself or gather your friends, form a team and battle against other players or creatures to win prizes, depending only on your own skills and strategies to secure your victory!

The game contains 5 different classes of Hero, with specific abilities, basic attacks and stats. Abilities range from a variety of types and utility like damage, healing, projectile, movement, specialty and are affected by the player's stats. The battles (PvP or PvE) are fought with 1 to 3 Heroes per team, in maps designed with unique characteristics and terrain.

With our character creation mechanic you can mix abilities and stats from all classes. You have the flexibility to build an unique hybrid to fit your playstyle or explore complex synergies between characters.

Battle on top of thematic maps with destrucitble terrain, moving platforms, portals and unique thematic mechanics such as volcano eruptions, raising water levels, strong winds.
